quote: The best revenge is massive success.
author: Frank Sinatra

quote: In order to succeed, your desire for success should be greater than your fear of failure.
author: Bill Cosby

quote: An organization's ability to learn, and translate that learning into action rapidly, is the ultimate competitive advantage.
author: Jack Welch

quote: Everyone is your best friend when you are successful. Make sure that the people that you surround yourself with are also the people that you are not afraid of failing with.
author: Paula Abdul

quote: The Greatest Discovery Of All Time Is That A Person Can Change His Future By Merely Changing His Attitude.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: Eighty percent of success is showing up.
author: Woody Allen

quote: Few things can help an individual more than to place responsibility on him, and to let him know that you trust him.
author: Booker T. Washington

quote: It'S Not What You'Ve Got, It'S What You Use That Makes A Difference.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: Patriotism Means To Stand By The Country. It Does Not Mean To Stand By The President.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: A minute's success pays the failure of years.
author: Robert Browning

quote: The achievements of an organization are the results of the combined effort of each individual.
author: Vince Lombardi

quote: You Don'T Have To Be Great To Start, But You Have To Start To Be Great
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: Success is only meaningful and enjoyable if it feels like your own.
author: Michelle Obama

quote: Many Marriages Would Be Better If The Husband And The Wife Clearly Understood That They Are On The Same Side.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: Exchange ideas frequently.
author: James Cash Penney

quote: Success is best when it's shared.
author: Howard Schultz

quote: The most difficult thing is the decision to act, the rest is merely tenacity.
author: Amelia Earhart

quote: Build your own dreams, or someone else will hire you to build theirs.
author: Farrah Gray

quote: My father told me, never have partners.
author: Howard Hughes

quote: A truly rich man is one whose children run into his arms when his hands are empty.
author: Unknown

quote: Much effort, much prosperity.
author: Euripides

quote: We Have New Developing Ties With Japan Whom Always Supports Our Democratic Process And Economic Development.
author: Ali A. Saleh

quote: If you can dream it, you can achieve it.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: Achieving Life Is Not The Equivalent Of Avoiding Death.
author: Ayn Rand

quote: Women, like men, should try to do the impossible. And when they fail, their failure should be a challenge to others.
author: Amelia Earhart

quote: One Of The Greatest Discoveries A Man Makes, One Of His Great Surprises, Is To Find He Can Do What He Was Afraid He Couldn'T Do.
author: Henry Ford

quote: Our Greatest Weakness Lies In Giving Up. The Most Certain Way To Succeed Is Always To Try Just One More Time.
author: Thomas A. Edison

quote: You become what you believe.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: The business of America is business.
author: Calvin Coolidge

quote: Don't let your ego get too close to your position, so that if your position gets shot down, your ego doesn't go with it.
author: Colin Powell

quote: The World We Have Created Is A Product Of Our Thinking.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Reason and judgment are the qualities of a leader.
author: Tacitus

quote: The first responsibility of a leader is to define reality. The last is to say thank you. In between, the leader is a servant.
author: Max de Pree

quote: A truly rich man is one whose children run into his arms when his hands are empty.
author: Unknown

quote: Failure Is Not The Opposite Of Success; It'S Part Of Success.
author: Arianna Huffington

quote: In The Business World, The Rearview Mirror Is Always Clearer Than The Windshield.
author: Warren Buffett

quote: Success comes when people act together; failure tends to happen alone.
author: Deepak Chopra

quote: Success Is Not Final, Failure Is Not Fatal: It Is The Courage To Continue That Counts.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: Just because something doesn't do what you planned it to do doesn't mean it's useless.
author: Thomas A. Edison

quote: Positive Thinking Will Let You Do Everything Better Than Negative Thinking Will.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: It is hard to fail, but it is worse never to have tried to succeed.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: These Capitalists Generally Act Harmoniously And In Concert, To Fleece The People.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: Buy The Ticket, Take The Ride.
author: Hunter S. Thompson

quote: Find something you're passionate about and keep tremendously interested in it.
author: Julia Child

quote: It'S Fine To Celebrate Success But It Is More Important To Heed The Lessons Of Failure.
author: Bill Gates

quote: I Wish To Preach, Not The Doctrine Of Ignoble Ease, But The Doctrine Of The Strenuous Life.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: If the career you have chosen has some unexpected inconvenience, console yourself by reflecting that no career is without them.
author: Jane Fonda

quote: A developed India by 2020, or even earlier, is not a dream. It need not be a mere vision in the minds of many Indians. It is a mission we can all take up - and succeed.
author: Abdul Kalam

quote: Risk Comes From Not Knowing What You'Re Doing.
author: Warren Buffett

quote: History Is More Or Less Bunk.
author: Henry Ford

quote: The Only Way To Do News On Television Is Not To Be Terrified Of It.
author: David Brinkley

quote: If opportunity doesn't knock, build a door.
author: Milton Berle

quote: Success is to be measured not so much by the position that one has reached in life as by the obstacles which he has overcome.
author: Booker T. Washington

quote: The youth need to be enabled to become job generators from job seekers.
author: Abdul Kalam

quote: Impatience never commanded success.
author: Edwin H. Chapin

quote: It Is Very Dangerous To Have Your Self-Worth Riding On Your Results As An Athlete.
author: Jim Courier

quote: Don’T Let The Noise Of Others’ Opinions Drown Out Your Own Inner Voice.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: When I Look Into The Future, It'S So Bright It Burns My Eyes.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: Laziness May Appear Attractive, But Work Gives Satisfaction.
author: Anne Frank

quote: The level of our success is limited only by our imagination and no act of kindness, however small, is ever wasted.
author: Aesop

quote: There is little success where there is little laughter.
author: Andrew Carnegie

quote: Success is the sum of small efforts - repeated day in and day out.
author: Robert Collier

quote: And while the law of competition may be sometimes hard for the individual, it is best for the race, because it ensures the survival of the fittest in every department.
author: Andrew Carnegie

quote: In modern business it is not the crook who is to be feared most, it is the honest man who doesn't know what he is doing.
author: William Wordsworth

quote: Treat failure as a lesson on how not to approach achieving a goal, and then use that learning to improve your chances of success when you try again. Failure is only the end if you decide to stop.
author: Richard Branson

quote: You know you are on the road to success if you would do your job, and not be paid for it.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: The Trouble With Censors Is That They Worry If A Girl Has Cleavage. They Ought To Worry If She Hasn'T Any.
author: Marilyn Monroe

quote: Success seems to be largely a matter of hanging on after others have let go.
author: William Feather

quote: If you want to kill any idea in the world, get a committee working on it.
author: Charles Kettering

quote: Education costs money.  But then so does ignorance.
author: Sir Claus Moser

quote: If you look at what you have in life, you’ll always have more. If you look at what you don’t have in life, you’ll never have enough.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: We'Re Getting Hurt, But I'M A Long-Term Investor.
author: Al Waleed Bin Talal

quote: Believe you can and you’re halfway there.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: No One Changes The World Who Isn'T Obsessed.
author: Billie Jean King

quote: Be Brave. Take Risks. Nothing Can Substitute Experience.
author: Paulo Coelho

quote: Failures, repeated failures, are finger posts on the road to achievement. One fails forward toward success.
author: C. S. Lewis

quote: When in doubt, mumble; when in trouble, delegate; when in charge, ponder.
author: James H. Boren

quote: Derivatives Are Financial Weapons Of Mass Destruction.
author: Warren Buffett

quote: Perseverance is a great element of success. If you only knock long enough and loud enough at the gate, you are sure to wake up somebody.
author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quote: Test fast, fail fast, adjust fast.
author: Tom Peters

quote: If you don't understand the details of your business you are going to fail.
author: Jeff Bezos

quote: If everyone is moving forward together, then success takes care of itself.
author: Henry Ford

quote: Start where you are. Use what you have.  Do what you can.
author: Arthur Ashe

quote: Sometimes when you innovate, you make mistakes. It is best to admit them quickly, and get on with improving your other innovations.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: They succeed, because they think they can.
author: Virgil

quote: Dogs Never Bite Me. Just Humans.
author: Marilyn Monroe

quote: Dreaming, after all, is a form of planning.
author: Gloria Steinem

quote: First-rate people hire first-rate people; second-rate people hire third-rate people.
author: Leo Rosten

quote: Believe you can and you’re halfway there.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: Champions Keep Playing Until They Get It Right.
author: Billie Jean King

quote: Nothing so conclusively proves a man's ability to lead others as what he does from day to day to lead himself.
author: Thomas J. Watson

quote: Our work is the presentation of our capabilities.
author: Edward Gibbon

quote: A Goal Properly Set Is Halfway Reached.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: Being The Richest Man In The Cemetery Doesn'T Matter To Me. Going To Bed At Night Saying We'Ve Done Something Wonderful, That'S What Matters To Me.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: You Are Responsible For Your Life. You Can'T Keep Blaming Somebody Else For Your Dysfunction. Life Is Really About Moving On.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: If you can dream it, you can achieve it.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: Sports For Me Is When A Guy Walks Off The Court, And You Really Can'T Tell Whether He Won Or Lost, When He Carries Himself With Pride Either Way.
author: Jim Courier

quote: It is better to fail in originality than to succeed in imitation.
author: Herman Melville

quote: A business that makes nothing but money is a poor business.
author: Henry Ford

quote: You Are Never Too Old To Set Another Goal Or To Dream A New Dream.
author: C. S. Lewis

quote: Profit in business comes from repeat customers, customers that boast about your project or service, and that bring friends with them.
author: W. Edwards Deming

quote: Start with good people, lay out the rules, communicate with your employees, motivate them and reward them. If you do all those things effectively, you can't miss.
author: Lee Iacocca

quote: There are no traffic jams along the extra mile.
author: Roger Staubach

quote: If You Come To Fame Not Understanding Who You Are, It Will Define Who You Are.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: Doubt kills more dreams than failure ever will.
author: Suzy Kassem

quote: All our dreams can come true; if we have the courage to pursue them.
author: Walt Disney

quote: Details create the big picture.
author: Sanford I. Weill

quote: Your Time Is Limited, So Don'T Waste It Living Someone Else'S Life.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Design Is Not Just What It Looks Like And Feels Like. Design Is How It Works.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: No enterprise is more likely to succeed than one concealed from the enemy until it is ripe for execution.
author: Niccolo Machiavelli

quote: Industry is fortune's right hand, and frugality its left.
author: John Ray

quote: The Past Is A Ghost, The Future A Dream, And All We Ever Have Is Now.
author: Bill Cosby

quote: Eighty percent of success is showing up.
author: Woody Allen

quote: Success Is A Lousy Teacher. It Seduces Smart People Into Thinking They Can'T Lose.
author: Bill Gates

quote: Success does not consist in never making mistakes but in never making the same one a second time.
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: No Legacy Is So Rich As Honesty.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: I Have Not Failed. I'Ve Just Found 10 000 Ways That Won'T Work.
author: Thomas A. Edison

quote: Wise are those who learn that the bottom line doesn't always have to be their top priority.
author: William Arthur Ward

quote: However difficult life may seem, there is always something you can do and succeed at.
author: Stephen Hawking

quote: A brand for a company is like a reputation for a person. You earn reputation by trying to do hard things well.
author: Jeff Bezos

quote: There are no limits. There are only plateaus, and you must not stay there - you must go beyond them.
author: Bruce Lee

quote: All lasting business is built on friendship.
author: Alfred A. Montapert

quote: Don't simply retire from something; have something to retire to.
author: Harry Emerson Fosdick

quote: It always seems impossible until it's done.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: If you want your children to turn out well, spend twice as much time with them, and half as much money.
author: Abigail Van Buren

quote: The Attempt To Combine Wisdom And Power Has Only Rarely Been Successful And Then Only For A Short While.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Success consists of going from failure to failure without loss of enthusiasm.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: You become what you believe.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: Satisfaction lies in the effort, not in the attainment, full effort is full victory.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: It is literally true that you can succeed best and quickest by helping others to succeed.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: Trust is the lubrication that makes it possible for organizations to work.
author: Warren Bennis

quote: Success Is Dependent Upon The Glands - Sweat Glands.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: Success is falling nine times and getting up ten.
author: Jon Bon Jovi

quote: Those who cannot work with their hearts achieve but a hollow, half-hearted success that breeds bitterness all around.
author: Abdul Kalam

quote: I Myself Prefer My New Zealand Eggs For Breakfast.
author: Elizabeth II

quote: Your time is limited, so don’t waste it living someone else’s life.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: If We Did All The Things We Are Capable Of, We Would Literally Astound Ourselves.
author: Thomas A. Edison

quote: I hope we shall crush in its birth the aristocracy of our monied corporations which dare already to challenge our government to a trial by strength, and bid defiance to the laws of our country.
author: Thomas Jefferson

quote: Victory is sweetest when you've known defeat.
author: Malcolm S. Forbes

quote: Our greatest weakness lies in giving up. The most certain way to succeed is always to try just one more time.
author: Thomas A. Edison

quote: To My Mind The Old Masters Are Not Art; Their Value Is In Their Scarcity.
author: Thomas A. Edison

quote: If You Can'T Make It Good, At Least Make It Look Good.
author: Bill Gates

quote: If you find it in your heart to care for somebody else, you will have succeeded.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: For the merchant, even honesty is a financial speculation.
author: Charles Baudelaire

quote: The only place success comes before work is in the dictionary.
author: Vince Lombardi

quote: The way a team plays as a whole determines its success.
author: Babe Ruth

quote: I've failed over and over and over again in my life and that is why I succeed.
author: Michael Jordan

quote: Nothing In Life Is To Be Feared, It Is Only To Be Understood. Now Is The Time To Understand More, So That We May Fear Less.
author: Marie Curie

quote: Success is the child of audacity.
author: Benjamin Disraeli

quote: Time is the scarcest resource and unless it is managed nothing else can be managed.
author: Peter Drucker

quote: In the business world, everyone is paid in two coins: cash and experience. Take the experience first; the cash will come later.
author: Harold S. Geneen

quote: Fortune befriends the bold.
author: Emily Dickinson

quote: Great Ideas Originate In The Muscles.
author: Thomas A. Edison

quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Before Marriage, A Girl Has To Make Love To A Man To Hold Him. After Marriage, She Has To Hold Him To Make Love To Him.
author: Marilyn Monroe

quote: It's easy to make a buck. It's a lot tougher to make a difference.
author: Tom Brokaw

quote: I attribute my success to this: I never gave or took any excuse.
author: Florence Nightingale

quote: Be A Yardstick Of Quality. Some People Aren'T Used To An Environment Where Excellence Is Expected.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Whether you think you can or you think you can’t, you’re right.
author: Henry Ford

quote: We must balance conspicuous consumption with conscious capitalism.
author: Kevin Kruse

quote: The question isn’t who is going to let me; it’s who is going to stop me.
author: Ayn Rand

quote: Success isn't always about greatness. It's about consistency. Consistent hard work leads to success. Greatness will come.
author: Dwayne Johnson

quote: The more you praise and celebrate your life, the more there is in life to celebrate.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: Strive not to be a success, but rather to be of value.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Energy and persistence conquer all things.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: We need to create brand institutions. In the fortune 500 companies, 5 Indian companies are named while 15 are from China though we have similar kind of populations.
author: Abdul Kalam

quote: If Everyone Is Moving Forward Together, Then Success Takes Care Of Itself.
author: Henry Ford

quote: In Order To Succeed, Your Desire For Success Should Be Greater Than Your Fear Of Failure.
author: Bill Cosby

quote: There are no secrets to success. It is the result of preparation, hard work, and learning from failure.
author: Colin Powell

quote: There Is No Substitute For Hard Work.
author: Thomas A. Edison

quote: I attribute my success to this: I never gave or took any excuse.
author: Florence Nightingale

quote: Many of life's failures are people who did not realize how close they were to success when they gave up.
author: Thomas A. Edison

quote: Nothing is impossible, the word itself says 'I'm possible'!
author: Audrey Hepburn

quote: Corporation: An ingenious device for obtaining profit without individual responsibility.
author: Ambrose Bierce

quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: I’ve missed more than 9000 shots in my career. I’ve lost almost 300 games. 26 times I’ve been trusted to take the game winning shot and missed. I’ve failed over and over and over again in my life. And that is why I succeed.
author: Michael Jordan

quote: If you want to lift yourself up, lift up someone else.
author: Booker T. Washington

quote: Success isn't overnight. It's when everyday you get a little better than the day before. It all adds up.
author: Dwayne Johnson

quote: The greatest wealth is to live content with little.
author: Plato

quote: This Is The First Convention Of The Space Age - Where A Candidate Can Promise The Moon And Mean It.
author: David Brinkley

quote: Failure is the condiment that gives success its flavor.
author: Truman Capote

quote: Success Is A Personal Standard, Reaching For The Highest That Is In Us, Becoming All That We Can Be.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: Disneyland is a work of love. We didn't go into Disneyland just with the idea of making money.
author: Walt Disney

quote: Men And Women Belong To Different Species And Communications Between Them Is Still In Its Infancy.
author: Bill Cosby

quote: Success is often achieved by those who don't know that failure is inevitable.
author: Coco Chanel

quote: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success. If you love what you are doing, you will be successful.
author: Albert Schweitzer

quote: Innovation Distinguishes Between A Leader And A Follower.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Sometimes a noble failure serves the world as faithfully as a distinguished success.
author: Edward Dowden

quote: There is only one boss. The customer. And he can fire everybody in the company from the chairman on down, simply by spending his money somewhere else.
author: Sam Walton

quote: Microsoft Is Not About Greed. It'S About Innovation And Fairness.
author: Bill Gates

quote: The question isn’t who is going to let me; it’s who is going to stop me.
author: Ayn Rand

quote: Once You Replace Negative Thoughts With Positive Ones, You'Ll Start Having Positive Results.
author: Willie Nelson

quote: I Cannot Discover That Anyone Knows Enough To Say Definitely What Is And What Is Not Possible.
author: Henry Ford

quote: I believe you have to be willing to be misunderstood if you're going to innovate.
author: Jeff Bezos

quote: The measure of who we are is what we do with what we have.
author: Vince Lombardi

quote: What’s money? A man is a success if he gets up in the morning and goes to bed at night and in between does what he wants to do.
author: Bob Dylan

quote: Gliders, Sail Planes, They'Re Wonderful Flying Machines. It'S The Closest You Can Come To Being A Bird.
author: Neil Armstrong

quote: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: The fastest way to succeed is to look as if you're playing by somebody else's rules, while quietly playing by your own.
author: Michael Korda

quote: Success Depends Upon Previous Preparation, And Without Such Preparation There Is Sure To Be Failure.
author: Confucius

quote: The secret of success in every field is redefining what success means to you. It can't be your parent's definition, the media's definition, or your neighbor's definition. Otherwise, success will never satisfy you.
author: RuPaul

quote: The secret of business is to know something that nobody else knows.
author: Aristotle Onassis

quote: Dreaming, after all, is a form of planning.
author: Gloria Steinem

quote: Your Successes And Happiness Are Forgiven You Only If You Generously Consent To Share Them.
author: Albert Camus

quote: Not Life, But Good Life, Is To Be Chiefly Valued.
author: Socrates

quote: One's mind has a way of making itself up in the background, and it suddenly becomes clear what one means to do.
author: A. C. Benson

quote: Everyone has an invisible sign hanging from their neck saying, 'Make me feel important.' Never forget this message when working with people.
author: Mary Kay Ash

quote: There Has Never Yet Been A Man In Our History Who Led A Life Of Ease Whose Name Is Worth Remembering.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: I am not a product of my circumstances. I am a product of my decisions.
author: Stephen Covey

quote: People begin to become successful the minute they decide to be.
author: Harvey MacKay

quote: A Successful Man Is One Who Can Lay A Firm Foundation With The Bricks Others Have Thrown At Him.
author: David Brinkley

quote: An organization, no matter how well designed, is only as good as the people who live and work in it.
author: Dee Hock

quote: Don'T Find Fault, Find A Remedy.
author: Henry Ford

quote: Rule No.1: Never Lose Money. Rule No.2: Never Forget Rule No.1.
author: Warren Buffett

quote: When I Am Presented With Good Work, I Accept It. Wherever It Is.
author: Phylicia Rashad

quote: Chains Of Habit Are Too Light To Be Felt Until They Are Too Heavy To Be Broken.
author: Warren Buffett

quote: Do more than is required. What is the distance between someone who achieves their goals consistently and those who spend their lives and careers merely following? The extra mile.
author: Gary Ryan Blair

quote: Carpe per diem - seize the check.
author: Robin Williams

quote: Applause Waits On Success.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Talent alone won't make you a success. Neither will being in the right place at the right time, unless you are ready.
author: Johnny Carson

quote: Economic depression cannot be cured by legislative action or executive pronouncement. Economic wounds must be healed by the action of the cells of the economic body - the producers and consumers themselves.
author: Herbert Hoover

quote: A Man Who Is Good Enough To Shed His Blood For The Country Is Good Enough To Be Given A Square Deal Afterwards.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: Believe You Can And You'Re Halfway There.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
author: C.S. Lewis

quote: The Way You See People Is The Way You Treat Them.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: Whether you think you can or you think you can’t, you’re right.
author: Henry Ford

quote: Some people regard private enterprise as a predatory tiger to be shot. Others look on it as a cow they can milk. Not enough people see it as a healthy horse, pulling a sturdy wagon.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: There are no secrets to success. It is the result of preparation, hard work, and learning from failure.
author: Colin Powell

quote: Even a mistake may turn out to be the one thing necessary to a worthwhile achievement.
author: Henry Ford

quote: Wars Are Caused By Undefended Wealth.
author: Ernest Hemingway

quote: Unbelievable, Yet, What Else Could It Be?
author: Jim Courier

quote: Making money is art and working is art and good business is the best art.
author: Andy Warhol

quote: If you have no critics you'll likely have no success.
author: Malcolm X

quote: There Are Two Sides To Every Issue: One Side Is Right And The Other Is Wrong, But The Middle Is Always Evil.
author: Ayn Rand

quote: When something is important enough, you do it even if the odds are not in your favor.
author: Elon Musk

quote: Whenever you find yourself on the side of the majority, it is time to pause and reflect.
author: Mark Twain

quote: More business is lost every year through neglect than through any other cause.
author: Rose Kennedy

quote: Human Beings Are The Only Creatures On Earth That Allow Their Children To Come Back Home.
author: Bill Cosby

quote: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
author: Confucius

quote: The buck stops with the guy who signs the checks.
author: Rupert Murdoch

quote: Far And Away The Best Prize That Life Has To Offer Is The Chance To Work Hard At Work Worth Doing.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: I Don'T Know The Key To Success, But The Key To Failure Is Trying To Please Everybody.
author: Bill Cosby

quote: Sales are contingent upon the attitude of the salesman - not the attitude of the prospect.
author: W. Clement Stone

quote: Sooner or later, those who win are those who think they can.
author: Paul Tournier

quote: One of the tests of leadership is the ability to recognize a problem before it becomes an emergency.
author: Arnold H. Glasow

quote: Most people give up just when they're about to achieve success. They quit on the one yard line. They give up at the last minute of the game one foot from a winning touchdown.
author: Ross Perot

quote: Anyone who has lost track of time when using a computer knows the propensity to dream, the urge to make dreams come true and the tendency to miss lunch.
author: Tim Berners-Lee

quote: The most difficult thing is the decision to act, the rest is merely tenacity.
author: Amelia Earhart

quote: Great things in business are never done by one person. They're done by a team of people.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: There are no traffic jams along the extra mile.
author: Roger Staubach

quote: Success is never accidental.
author: Jack Dorsey

quote: Expect The Best. Prepare For The Worst. Capitalize On What Comes.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: There is no success without hardship.
author: Sophocles

quote: Many A Man Thinks He Is Buying Pleasure, When He Is Really Selling Himself To It.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: I Don'T Want To Make Money, I Just Want To Be Wonderful.
author: Marilyn Monroe

quote: Most People Spend More Time And Energy Going Around Problems Than In Trying To Solve Them.
author: Henry Ford

quote: Formula for success: rise early, work hard, strike oil.
author: J. Paul Getty

quote: Victory has a thousand fathers, but defeat is an orphan.
author: John F. Kennedy

quote: I am not a product of my circumstances. I am a product of my decisions.
author: Stephen Covey

quote: When a nation is surrounded by weaponized nations, she has to equip herself.
author: Abdul Kalam

quote: When It Is Obvious That The Goals Cannot Be Reached, Don'T Adjust The Goals, Adjust The Action Steps.
author: Confucius

quote: A Man Should Never Neglect His Family For Business.
author: Walt Disney

quote: Success is how high you bounce when you hit bottom.
author: George S. Patton

quote: There is no such thing as a self-made man. You will reach your goals only with the help of others.
author: George Shinn

quote: The way to get things done is not to mind who gets the credit for doing them.
author: Benjamin Jowett

quote: Brand is just a perception, and perception will match reality over time. Sometimes it will be ahead, other times it will be behind. But brand is simply a collective impression some have about a product.
author: Elon Musk

quote: Where There Is No Struggle, There Is No Strength.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The second best time is now.
author: Chinese Proverb

quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Anything That Won'T Sell, I Don'T Want To Invent. Its Sale Is Proof Of Utility, And Utility Is Success.
author: Thomas A. Edison

quote: No Man Is Justified In Doing Evil On The Ground Of Expedience.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: The herd instinct among forecasters makes sheep look like independent thinkers.
author: Edgar Fiedler

quote: So Go Ahead. Fall Down. The World Looks Different From The Ground.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: I never dreamed about success. I worked for it.
author: Estee Lauder

quote: People often say that motivation doesn’t last. Well, neither does bathing.  That’s why we recommend it daily.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: If one does not know to which port one is sailing, no wind is favorable.
author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quote: The superior man understands what is right; the inferior man understands what will sell.
author: Confucius

quote: Money Demands That You Sell, Not Your Weakness To Men'S Stupidity, But Your Talent To Their Reason.
author: Ayn Rand

quote: The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The second best time is now.
author: Chinese Proverb

quote: Let Blockheads Read What Blockheads Wrote.
author: Warren Buffett

quote: Money Is Only A Tool. It Will Take You Wherever You Wish, But It Will Not Replace You As The Driver.
author: Ayn Rand

quote: There is no substitute for victory.
author: Douglas MacArthur

quote: If you want to lift yourself up, lift up someone else.
author: Booker T. Washington

quote: It is not what you do for your children, but what you have taught them to do for themselves, that will make them successful human beings.
author: Ann Landers

quote: It is not what you do for your children, but what you have taught them to do for themselves, that will make them successful human beings.
author: Ann Landers

quote: To follow, without halt, one aim: that's the secret of success.
author: Anna Pavlova

quote: Always bear in mind that your own resolution to succeed is more important than any other.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: We Must Believe That We Are Gifted For Something, And That This Thing, At Whatever Cost, Must Be Attained.
author: Marie Curie

quote: Strive Not To Be A Success, But Rather To Be Of Value.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Success is a lousy teacher. It seduces smart people into thinking they can't lose.
author: Bill Gates

quote: Life isn’t about getting and having, it’s about giving and being.
author: Kevin Kruse

quote: Success isn't about the end result, it's about what you learn along the way.
author: Vera Wang

quote: I couldn't wait for success, so I went ahead without it.
author: Jonathan Winters

quote: Do not trust people. They are capable of greatness.
author: Stanislaw Lem

quote: Build your own dreams, or someone else will hire you to build theirs.
author: Farrah Gray

quote: Few things can help an individual more than to place responsibility on him, and to let him know that you trust him.
author: Booker T. Washington

quote: Rank does not confer privilege or give power. It imposes responsibility.
author: Peter Drucker

quote: Talent In Cheaper Than Table Salt. What Separates The Talented Individual From The Successful One Is A Lot Of Hard Work.
author: Stephen King

quote: Success is not a good teacher, failure makes you humble.
author: Shah Rukh Khan

quote: Success in management requires learning as fast as the world is changing.
author: Warren Bennis

quote: Like Getting Into A Bleeding Competition With A Blood Bank.
author: Richard Branson

quote: The work of the individual still remains the spark that moves mankind ahead even more than teamwork.
author: Igor Sikorsky

quote: We All Live With The Objective Of Being Happy; Our Lives Are All Different And Yet The Same.
author: Anne Frank

quote: Money Is The Barometer Of A Society'S Virtue.
author: Ayn Rand

quote: Intellectual Property Has The Shelf Life Of A Banana.
author: Bill Gates

quote: It Is Not The Employer Who Pays The Wages. Employers Only Handle The Money. It Is The Customer Who Pays The Wages.
author: Henry Ford

quote: To Say "I Love You" One Must First Be Able To Say The "I."
author: Ayn Rand

quote: Do what you can, with what you've got, where you are.
author: Teddy Roosevelt

quote: The Airplane Has Had A Big Impact On My Life.
author: Jim Courier

quote: We must believe that we are gifted for something, and that this thing, at whatever cost, must be attained.
author: Marie Curie

quote: Opportunity Is Missed By Most People Because It Is Dressed In Overalls And Looks Like Work.
author: Thomas A. Edison

quote: Lots of folks confuse bad management with destiny.
author: Kin Hubbard

quote: The foundation stones for a balanced success are honesty, character, integrity, faith, love and loyalty.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: The best revenge is massive success.
author: Frank Sinatra

quote: As We Look Ahead Into The Next Century, Leaders Will Be Those Who Empower Others.
author: Bill Gates

quote: If you cannot work with love but only with distaste, it is better that you should leave your work.
author: Khalil Gibran

quote: The entrepreneur always searches for change, responds to it, and exploits it as an opportunity.
author: Peter Drucker

quote: Failure Is A Detour, Not A Dead-End Street.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: The most important quality in a leader is that of being acknowledged as such. All leaders whose fitness is questioned are clearly lacking in force.
author: Andre Maurois

quote: It takes more than capital to swing business. You've got to have the A. I. D. degree to get by - Advertising, Initiative, and Dynamics.
author: Isaac Asimov

quote: You Can'T Deny Laughter; When It Comes, It Plops Down In Your Favorite Chair And Stays As Long As It Wants.
author: Stephen King

quote: Failure Is Simply The Opportunity To Begin Again, This Time More Intelligently.
author: Henry Ford

quote: If you have one good idea, people will lend you twenty.
author: Marie von Ebner-Eschenbach

quote: I Am The Literary Equivalent Of A Big Mac And Fries.
author: Stephen King

quote: Almost all quality improvement comes via simplification of design, manufacturing... layout, processes, and procedures.
author: Tom Peters

quote: You Were Born To Win, But To Be A Winner, You Must Plan To Win, Prepare To Win, And Expect To Win.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: It is not from the benevolence of the butcher, the brewer, or the baker that we expect our dinner, but from their regard to their own interest.
author: Adam Smith

quote: True success is overcoming the fear of being unsuccessful.
author: Paul Sweeney

quote: If you want your children to turn out well, spend twice as much time with them, and half as much money.
author: Abigail Van Buren

quote: All My Life Through, The New Sights Of Nature Made Me Rejoice Like A Child.
author: Marie Curie

quote: If you owe the bank $100 that's your problem. If you owe the bank $100 million, that's the bank's problem.
author: J. Paul Getty

quote: If there is anything that a man can do well, I say let him do it. Give him a chance.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: We Enjoy The Process Far More Than The Proceeds.
author: Warren Buffett

quote: I'M Not Even Kind Of A Lesbian.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: Life isn’t about getting and having, it’s about giving and being.
author: Kevin Kruse

quote: Education costs money.  But then so does ignorance.
author: Sir Claus Moser

quote: What Do I Wear In Bed? Why, Chanel No. 5, Of Course.
author: Marilyn Monroe

quote: Failure is success in progress.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Start where you are. Use what you have.  Do what you can.
author: Arthur Ashe

quote: In order to attain the impossible, one must attempt the absurd.
author: Miguel de Cervantes

quote: I’ve missed more than 9000 shots in my career. I’ve lost almost 300 games. 26 times I’ve been trusted to take the game winning shot and missed. I’ve failed over and over and over again in my life. And that is why I succeed.
author: Michael Jordan

quote: Monsters Are Real, And Ghosts Are Real Too. They Live Inside Us, And Sometimes, They Win.
author: Stephen King

quote: When Obstacles Arise, You Change Your Direction To Reach Your Goal; You Do Not Change Your Decision To Get There.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: Happiness does not come from doing easy work but from the afterglow of satisfaction that comes after the achievement of a difficult task that demanded our best.
author: Theodore Isaac Rubin

quote: We Make Up Horrors To Help Us Cope With The Real Ones.
author: Stephen King

quote: You Know Why Divorces Are So Expensive? They'Re Worth It.
author: Willie Nelson

quote: Hesitation Increases In Relation To Risk In Equal Proportion To Age.
author: Ernest Hemingway

quote: The genius of a good leader is to leave behind him a situation which common sense, without the grace of genius, can deal with successfully.
author: Walter Lippmann

quote: A Lot Of People Quit Looking For Work As Soon As They Find A Job.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: There Is No Labor A Person Does That Is Undignified; If They Do It Right.
author: Bill Cosby

quote: Winning isn’t everything, but wanting to win is.
author: Vince Lombardi

quote: A man can succeed at almost anything for which he has unlimited enthusiasm.
author: Charles Schwab

quote: The best revenge is massive success.
author: Frank Sinatra

quote: Success is survival.
author: Leonard Cohen

quote: Keep Your Eyes On The Stars, And Your Feet On The Ground.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quote: Success Consists Of Going From Failure To Failure Without Loss Of Enthusiasm.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: Success or failure in business is caused more by the mental attitude even than by mental capacities.
author: Walter Scott

quote: When everything seems to be going against you, remember that the airplane takes off against the wind, not with it.
author: Henry Ford

quote: Strive not to be a success, but rather to be of value.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: You Know You Are On The Road To Success If You Would Do Your Job, And Not Be Paid For It.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: Your time is limited, so don’t waste it living someone else’s life.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Men are born to succeed, not to fail.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: If you're trying to create a company, it's like baking a cake. You have to have all the ingredients in the right proportion.
author: Elon Musk

quote: Success is finding satisfaction in giving a little more than you take.
author: Christopher Reeve

quote: Potentially, A Government Is The Most Dangerous Threat To Man'S Rights: It Holds A Legal Monopoly On The Use Of Physical Force Against Legally Disarmed Victims.
author: Ayn Rand

quote: We must believe that we are gifted for something, and that this thing, at whatever cost, must be attained.
author: Marie Curie

quote: If Past History Was All There Was To The Game, The Richest People Would Be Librarians.
author: Warren Buffett

quote: Regard it as just as desirable to build a chicken house as to build a cathedral.
author: Frank Lloyd Wright

quote: The meek shall inherit the Earth, but not its mineral rights.
author: J. Paul Getty

quote: A Word To The Wise Ain'T Necessary - It'S The Stupid Ones That Need The Advice.
author: Bill Cosby

quote: I Was Influenced A Lot By Those Around Me - There Was A Lot Of Singing That Went On In The Cotton Fields.
author: Willie Nelson

quote: Failure doesn't mean you are a failure it just means you haven't succeeded yet.
author: Robert H. Schuller

quote: Do we not realize that self respect comes with self reliance?
author: Abdul Kalam

quote: People Ask The Difference Between A Leader And A Boss. The Leader Leads, And The Boss Drives.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: The Value Of An Idea Lies In The Using Of It.
author: Thomas A. Edison

quote: When times are bad is when the real entrepreneurs emerge.
author: Robert Kiyosaki

quote: If you listen to your fears, you will die never knowing what a great person you might have been.
author: Robert H. Schuller

quote: Fiction Is The Truth Inside The Lie.
author: Stephen King

quote: Work hard in silence, let your success be your noise.
author: Frank Ocean

quote: No Great Intellectual Thing Was Ever Done By Great Effort.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: So little done, so much to do.
author: Cecil Rhodes

quote: Most of the important things in the world have been accomplished by people who have kept on trying when there seemed to be no hope at all.
author: Dale Carnegie

quote: Individual honors come with team success.
author: Gilbert Arenas

quote: Money Has Never Made Man Happy, Nor Will It, There Is Nothing In Its Nature To Produce Happiness. The More Of It One Has The More One Wants.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: First, have a definite, clear practical ideal; a goal, an objective. Second, have the necessary means to achieve your ends; wisdom, money, materials, and methods. Third, adjust all your means to that end.
author: Aristotle

quote: People often say that motivation doesn’t last. Well, neither does bathing.  That’s why we recommend it daily.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: Happiness Is That State Of Consciousness Which Proceeds From The Achievement Of One'S Values.
author: Ayn Rand

quote: Action is the foundational key to all success.
author: Pablo Picasso

quote: First, have a definite, clear practical ideal; a goal, an objective. Second, have the necessary means to achieve your ends; wisdom, money, materials, and methods. Third, adjust all your means to that end.
author: Aristotle

quote: In most things success depends on knowing how long it takes to succeed.
author: Montesquieu

quote: Success depends upon previous preparation, and without such preparation there is sure to be failure.
author: Confucius

quote: The secret of the team's success is easy - unity and hard work.
author: David Beckham

quote: No One Has Ever Become Poor By Giving.
author: Anne Frank

quote: I don't create companies for the sake of creating companies, but to get things done.
author: Elon Musk

quote: Your Most Unhappy Customers Are Your Greatest Source Of Learning.
author: Bill Gates

quote: An economist is an expert who will know tomorrow why the things he predicted yesterday didn't happen today.
author: Laurence J. Peter

quote: I Never Gave Up On Country Music Because I Knew What I Was Doing Was Not That Bad.
author: Willie Nelson

quote: Don't worry about people stealing your ideas. If your ideas are any good, you'll have to ram them down people's throats.
author: Howard Aiken

quote: Whether You Think That You Can, Or That You Can'T, You Are Usually Right.
author: Henry Ford

quote: Nothing I'Ve Ever Done Has Given Me More Joys And Rewards Than Being A Father To My Children.
author: Bill Cosby

quote: You Cannot Perform In A Manner Inconsistent With The Way You See Yourself.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: Being good in business is the most fascinating kind of art. Making money is art and working is art and good business is the best art.
author: Andy Warhol

quote: Scientific Thought And Its Creation Is The Common And Shared Heritage Of Mankind.
author: Abdus Salam

quote: My powers are ordinary. Only my application brings me success.
author: Isaac Newton

quote: Failure is success if we learn from it.
author: Malcolm Forbes

quote: I Never Did A Day'S Work In My Life. It Was All Fun.
author: Thomas A. Edison

quote: It's OK to have your eggs in one basket as long as you control what happens to that basket.
author: Elon Musk

quote: There is no time for cut-and-dried monotony. There is time for work. And time for love. That leaves no other time!
author: Coco Chanel

quote: When Everything Seems To Be Going Against You, Remember That The Airplane Takes Off Against The Wind, Not With It.
author: Henry Ford

quote: An Explanation Of Cause Is Not A Justification By Reason.
author: C. S. Lewis

quote: Winning isn’t everything, but wanting to win is.
author: Vince Lombardi

quote: Ideas pull the trigger, but instinct loads the gun.
author: Don Marquis

quote: Don'T Be Distracted By Criticism. Remember ~ The Only Taste Of Success Some People Have Is When They Take A Bite Out Of You.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: Nothing Will Work Unless You Do.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: Meetings are indispensable when you don't want to do anything.
author: John Kenneth Galbraith

quote: Turn Your Wounds Into Wisdom.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: The battles that count aren’t the ones for gold medals. The struggles within yourself–the invisible battles inside all of us–that’s where it’s at.
author: Jesse Owens

quote: I Don'T Believe In Failure. It Is Not Failure If You Enjoyed The Process.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: If you look at what you have in life, you’ll always have more. If you look at what you don’t have in life, you’ll never have enough.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: Strive not to be a success, but rather to be of value.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Every Aspect Of Western Culture Needs A New Code Of Ethics - A Rational Ethics - As A Precondition Of Rebirth.
author: Ayn Rand

quote: What’s money? A man is a success if he gets up in the morning and goes to bed at night and in between does what he wants to do.
author: Bob Dylan

quote: A company is only as good as the people it keeps.
author: Mary Kay Ash

quote: When everything seems to be going against you, remember that the airplane takes off against the wind, not with it.
author: Henry Ford

quote: The battles that count aren’t the ones for gold medals. The struggles within yourself–the invisible battles inside all of us–that’s where it’s at.
author: Jesse Owens

quote: Only Buy Something That You'D Be Perfectly Happy To Hold If The Market Shut Down For 10 Years.
author: Warren Buffett

quote: Coming Together Is A Beginning; Keeping Together Is Progress; Working Together Is Success.
author: Henry Ford

quote: No person will make a great business who wants to do it all himself or get all the credit.
author: Andrew Carnegie

quote: In order to succeed, your desire for success should be greater than your fear of failure.
author: Bill Cosby

quote: There was a point in the late '90s where all the graduating M.B.A.'s wanted to start companies in Silicon Valley, and for the most part they were not actually qualified to do it.
author: Marc Andreessen

quote: It takes 20 years to make an overnight success.
author: Eddie Cantor

quote: Effort only fully releases its reward after a person refuses to quit.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: If you want to succeed you should strike out on new paths, rather than travel the worn paths of accepted success.
author: John D. Rockefeller

quote: We must balance conspicuous consumption with conscious capitalism.
author: Kevin Kruse

quote: A cardinal principle of Total Quality escapes too many managers: you cannot continuously improve interdependent systems and processes until you progressively perfect interdependent, interpersonal relationships.
author: Stephen Covey

quote: The Devil'S Voice Is Sweet To Hear.
author: Stephen King
